author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
Learn a technique for communicating with your family in an emergency using a method used by spies during the Cold War. It's called the Dead Drop. While this is more of a fun exercise, it will actually teach you what is being surveilled and how and going through this will make you understand the privacy challenges that surrounds us.

How to Escape Like Jason Bourne
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wzTWkvkZ9go

title: The Dead Drop: Design a Communications Method Like a Spy
